ask question: Ask a question to AI assistant
skip song: Skip to the next song on Spotify
previous song: Go back to the previous song on Spotify
play song/album/artist: Play a specific song, album, or artist on Spotify
add song/album/artist to queue: Add a specific song, album, or artist to the queue on Spotify
max volume: Set the volume to maximum on Spotify
set volume: Set the volume to a specific level on Spotify
check new emails: Check if new email has arrived
start checking new emails: Check if new email has arrived every 15 minutes
weather: Checks weather for a given city
accept game: Finds button 'Accept!' on the screen and clicks it
idle mouse: Moves the mouse to prevent idle
